EmailTemplate.name: Event - Roadshow APAC, October 2015.Email - Reminder to Registrants - Singapore
EmailTemplate.subject: See you there! - Join Us & Meet the Tricentis VP of Product Management - November 5th, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Utrecht, Netherlands – June 25th, 2015
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thanks again for registering for Tosca Update Special in Utrecht on June 25th, 2015. We are looking forward to seeing you there and to introducing you to all of our new features in Tosca!
Agenda: 13:00 – 13:30 Registration & Welcome 13:30 – 15:00 New Features & Demo – Part 1 15:00 – 15:30 Coffee Break 15:30 – 16:45 New Features & Demo – Part 2 16:45 – 17:00 Summary and Q&A After: Join us after the presentations for a time to discuss and network!
Location: Jaarbeurs Supernova – Room Expedition Jaarbeursplein 3521 AL Utrecht
See you there!
Best Regards, The Tricentis Events Team
